meanings: Adverb in that direction, that way (→글로, 일로1)
make a phrase into a clause
실용회화-애정표현 Thoughts of you make me smile.

vlive.korean: [웃음이 절로 나오는 결과물] 뭐지 이게? [Cracking out at her drawing] What is this? 듣기 View video Dispatch : [Dicon] "미나’s Special Day" (디아이콘 : 트와이스)
vlive.english: [Cracking out at her drawing] What is this?

vlive.korean: [귀엽고 깜찍한 것 좀 봐... 웃음이 절로 나온다] 너무 귀여웠지~ [Look at him all cute... You make me smile] He was so cute. 듣기 View video V PICK! : [CIX] ~호로로록 쭈와아아압 막내즈의 우당탕탕 무국물 마시기~ (JINYOUNG&HYUNSUK drinking chicken radish soup)
vlive.english: [Look at him all cute... You make me smile] He was so cute.

vlive.korean: 절로 가 너는! You go away! 듣기 View video 컨스TV : 친구하고 그러는거 아니랴며!? [넘버식스] ep.3
[쿰척][감탄이 절로 나오는 완벽함] 컷! [Wow][Just perfect] Cut! 듣기 View video TWICE : TWICE TV "Feel Special" EP.01
[퇴사생각이 절로 몰려오는 거 있죠...] [makes me want to quit my job...] View video V PICK! : [NCT] 열심히 벌겠습니다! 갱얼쥐에겐 좋은것만 줘야 하니까요💪 (TAEYONG fooling around with hair)
vlive.english: [makes me want to quit my job...]

examples.korean: Sentences can be broken up into clauses. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 문장은 절로 나눌 수 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.english: In summer, the song sings itself. (William Carlos Williams) Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I could not help frowning at his impoliteness. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그의 무례한 행동에 절로 눈살이 찌푸려졌다 Neungyule
examples.english: I could not help frowning at his impoliteness. Add to Wordbook
